name: Bruh Moment Simulator 2069 2: Electric Bruhgaloo
description:
This is the sequel to my game: Bruh Moment Simulator 2069

In this sequel, you can (obviously) press the big button to play the 'Bruh' sound effect, 

but what differs this to the 1st, is that you can now change the volume, and pitch of the sound.

 When you press the button you have the option for it to change the background colour (WARNING: Flashing Colours). 

I will continue this project, with the intent of adding achievements, to fuel your ego full of Bruh Moments.

Now, go download the game! What are you waiting for? How could you miss this Bruh Moment worthy opportunity!
